The MOTU Digital Photo team

=== Members ===
* <nowiki>[[Hub]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[ChristofferOlsen]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[JorgeBernal]]</nowiki>

* ...you!
** See <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/phototeam|this]]</nowiki> Launchpad team page, and join us in #ubuntu-motu on irc.freenode.net.

=== Goals ===

* Release and keep up to date Digital Photo related packages.

=== Plans ===

* Have an uptodate ufraw package with exif support (licence problem from dcraw)
* Resolve license problem for dcraw <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/dcraw/+bug/86480|#86480]]</nowiki>
* Package more en more

=== Color Management ===

* Adobe ICC profile are non-free: http://www.adobe.com/support/downloads/iccprofiles/iccprofiles_linux.html
The license needs be sorted out before thinking shipping them.

=== Discussion ===

FredericLespez : ArgyllCMS 0.70 beta7 has been packaged for Mandriva by Frédéric CROZAT (See <nowiki>[[http://twinpeaks.dyndns.org/blog/general/2007/12/11/monitor-calibration-epilogue|this]]</nowiki> entry on his blog). By looking at the RPM spec file, I managed to build it on Gutsy. I have not the necessary knowledge to create a deb, but may be somebody could use the spec file to create one ?<<BR>>
The SRPM package con be found <nowiki>[[ftp:--ftp.free.fr-mirrors-ftp.mandriva.com-MandrivaLinux-devel-cooker-SRPMS-contrib-release-argyllcms-0.70-0.1.Beta7.3mdv2008.1.src.rpm|here]]</nowiki>

HannoStock : I built hugin from SVN using the new cmake build system. If somebody else is working on this or is interested in collaborating, please contact me. Experimental packages can be downloaded from <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~hanno-stock/+archive|my ppa]]</nowiki>. The hugin team is about to release a new version in the next few weeks.
